name: Microsys
tag_list: software, custom, designed, website, tools, industrial
overview:
Microsys develops a wide range of products and solutions. From custom designed software in industrial environments to standard software for business and home users. Custom designed software development and consulting.

In 1978 Micro-Sys became a registered company and in 1980 as an ApS, a Danish term for private limited company, both things in Denmark. Since then Microsys has been registered as an official company alias / secondary name in which the company operates under in day-to-day business.

Today, a major niche in Microsys is software for website owners with a whole product suite available to cover most needs.

Of industrial software, recent solutions involve: MRP - Material Requirements Planning Industrial PC / PLC robot automation RFID (tags) - Radio Frequency ID Foodtech sector (traceability etc.)

Primary custom software markets are Denmark, Noway and Spain.
